Articles.Content: So, I was kind of pondering on the insane potential we have now for colonies. Can we use colony parts with vessel parts? Will there be an inside to colonies one day? (please be yes). What special tasks and and set ups can we do and acquire in a  colony? What will the kerbal have to do manually? What can you do with the colony? Would it be wise to add a sort of control system to the colony similar to how you control ships, or will it just be like a new ksc? If this has it's seperate active channel then I'm sorry for this. This sounds like a very interesting topic that would be cool if the community shares their thoughts and if devs peeked in although probably with little information.
We're already discussing exactly that here:
